item.title: MIUI OS1.0.26.0.ULIMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 Lite Global

Codename: taoyao

Version: OS1.0.26.0.ULIMIXM | 14.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 19deff5113f2aba7398909ce633f6800

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.
